Pangolin
Pangolin is a lightweight rapid development library for managing OpenGL display / interaction and video input

handler_image.h
1 #include <pangolin/display/viewport.h>
2 #include <pangolin/handler/handler.h>
3 #include <pangolin/plot/range.h>

5 namespace pangolin
6 {
7 
8 class ImageViewHandler : public Handler
9 {
10 public:
11  ImageViewHandler(size_t w, size_t h)
12  : linked_view_handler(0),
13  rview_default(-0.5,w-0.5,h-0.5,0-0.5),
14  rview_max(-0.5,w-0.5,-0.5,h-0.5),
15  rview(rview_default), target(rview),
16  use_nn(false)
17  {
18  }
19 
20  void UpdateView()
21  {
22  // TODO: Base this on current framerate.
23  const float animate_factor = 1.0f / 5.0f;
24 
25  if( linked_view_handler ) {
26  // Synchronise rview and target with linked plotter
27  rview = linked_view_handler->rview;
28  target = linked_view_handler->target;
29  selection = linked_view_handler->selection;
30  }else{
31  // Clamp target to image dimensions.
32  AdjustScale();
33  AdjustTranslation();
34 
35  // Animate view window toward target
36  pangolin::XYRangef d = target - rview;
37  rview += d * animate_factor;
38  }
39  }
40 
41  void ScreenToImage(Viewport& v, int xpix, int ypix, float& ximg, float& yimg)
42  {
43  ximg = rview.x.min + rview.x.Size() * (xpix - v.l) / (float)v.w;
44  yimg = rview.y.min + rview.y.Size() * (ypix - v.b) / (float)v.h;
45  }
46 
47  bool UseNN() const
48  {
49  return use_nn;
50  }
51 
52  pangolin::XYRangef& GetViewToRender()
53  {
54  return rview;
55  }
56 
57  pangolin::XYRangef& GetView()
58  {
59  return target;
60  }
61 
62  pangolin::XYRangef& GetDefaultView()
63  {
64  return rview_default;
65  }
66 
67  pangolin::XYRangef& GetSelection()
68  {
69  return selection;
70  }
71 
72  void SetView(const pangolin::XYRangef& range)
73  {
74  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
75  tv.rview = range;
76  tv.target = range;
77  }
78 
79  void SetViewSmooth(const pangolin::XYRangef& range)
80  {
81  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
82  tv.target = range;
83  }
84 
85  void ScrollView(float x, float y)
86  {
87  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
88  ScrollViewSmooth(x,y);
89  tv.rview.x += x;
90  tv.rview.y += y;
91  }
92 
93  void ScrollViewSmooth(float x, float y)
94  {
95  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
96  tv.target.x += x;
97  tv.target.y += y;
98  }
99 
100  void ScaleView(float x, float y, float cx, float cy)
101  {
102  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
103  ScaleViewSmooth(x,y,cx,cy);
104  tv.rview.x.Scale(x,cx);
105  tv.rview.y.Scale(y,cy);
106  }
107 
108  void ScaleViewSmooth(float x, float y, float cx, float cy)
109  {
110  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
111  tv.target.x.Scale(x,cx);
112  tv.target.y.Scale(y,cy);
113  }
114 
115  void ResetView()
116  {
117  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
118  tv.target = tv.rview_default;
119  }

122  /// pangolin::Handler
123  ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
124 
125  void Keyboard(View&, unsigned char key, int x, int y, bool pressed) PANGOLIN_OVERRIDE
126  {
127  XYRangef& sel = linked_view_handler ? linked_view_handler->selection : selection;
128  const float mvfactor = 1.0f / 10.0f;
129  const float c[2] = { rview.x.Mid(), rview.y.Mid() };
130 
131 
132  if(pressed) {
133  if(key == '\r') {
134  if( sel.Area() != 0.0f && std::isfinite(sel.Area()) ) {
135  // Set view to equal selection
136  SetViewSmooth(sel);
137 
138  // Reset selection
139  sel.x.max = sel.x.min;
140  sel.y.max = sel.y.min;
141  }
142  }else if(key == 'n') {
143  use_nn = !use_nn;
144  }else if(key == 'l') {
145  if(to_link) {
146  linked_view_handler = to_link;
147  to_link = 0;
148  }else{
149  to_link = this;
150  }
151  }else if(key == PANGO_SPECIAL + PANGO_KEY_LEFT) {
152  const float w = target.x.Size();
153  const float dx = mvfactor*w;
154  ScrollViewSmooth(-dx, 0);
155  }else if(key == PANGO_SPECIAL + PANGO_KEY_RIGHT) {
156  const float w = target.x.Size();
157  const float dx = mvfactor*w;
158  ScrollViewSmooth(+dx, 0);
159  }else if(key == PANGO_SPECIAL + PANGO_KEY_DOWN) {
160  const float h = target.y.Size();
161  const float dy = mvfactor*h;
162  ScrollViewSmooth(0, -dy);
163  }else if(key == PANGO_SPECIAL + PANGO_KEY_UP) {
164  const float h = target.y.Size();
165  const float dy = mvfactor*h;
166  ScrollViewSmooth(0, +dy);
167  }else if(key == '=') {
168  ScaleViewSmooth(0.5, 0.5, c[0], c[1]);
169  }else if(key == '-') {
170  ScaleViewSmooth(2.0, 2.0, c[0], c[1]);
171  }else if(key == '#') {
172  ResetView();
173  }
174  }
175  }
176 
177  void Mouse(View& view, pangolin::MouseButton button, int x, int y, bool pressed, int button_state) PANGOLIN_OVERRIDE
178  {
179  XYRangef& sel = linked_view_handler ? linked_view_handler->selection : selection;
180  ScreenToImage(view.v, x, y, hover[0], hover[1]);
181 
182  const float scinc = 1.05f;
183  const float scdec = 1.0f/scinc;
184 
185  if(button_state & KeyModifierCtrl) {
186  const float mvfactor = 1.0f/20.0f;
187 
188  if(button == MouseWheelUp) {
189  ScrollViewSmooth(0.0f, +mvfactor*rview.y.Size() );
190  }else if(button == MouseWheelDown) {
191  ScrollViewSmooth(0.0f, -mvfactor*rview.y.Size() );
192  }else if(button == MouseWheelLeft) {
193  ScrollViewSmooth(+mvfactor*rview.x.Size(), 0.0f );
194  }else if(button == MouseWheelRight) {
195  ScrollViewSmooth(-mvfactor*rview.x.Size(), 0.0f );
196  }
197  }else{
198  if(button == MouseButtonLeft) {
199  // Update selected range
200  if(pressed) {
201  sel.x.min = hover[0];
202  sel.y.min = hover[1];
203  }
204  sel.x.max = hover[0];
205  sel.y.max = hover[1];
206  }else if(button == MouseWheelUp) {
207  ScaleViewSmooth(scdec, scdec, hover[0], hover[1]);
208  }else if(button == MouseWheelDown) {
209  ScaleViewSmooth(scinc, scinc, hover[0], hover[1]);
210  }
211  }
212 
213  FixSelection(sel);
214  last_mouse_pos[0] = x;
215  last_mouse_pos[1] = y;
216  }
217 
218  void MouseMotion(View& view, int x, int y, int button_state) PANGOLIN_OVERRIDE
219  {
220  XYRangef& sel = linked_view_handler ? linked_view_handler->selection : selection;
221  const int d[2] = {x-last_mouse_pos[0], y-last_mouse_pos[1]};
222 
223  // Update hover status (after potential resizing)
224  ScreenToImage(view.v, x, y, hover[0], hover[1]);
225 
226  if( button_state == MouseButtonLeft )
227  {
228  // Update selected range
229  sel.x.max = hover[0];
230  sel.y.max = hover[1];
231  }else if(button_state == MouseButtonRight )
232  {
233  Special(view, InputSpecialScroll, x, y, d[0], -d[1], 0.0f, 0.0f, button_state);
234  }
235 
236  last_mouse_pos[0] = x;
237  last_mouse_pos[1] = y;
238 
239  }
240 
241  void PassiveMouseMotion(View&, int x, int y, int button_state) PANGOLIN_OVERRIDE
242  {
243  }
244 
245  void Special(View& view, pangolin::InputSpecial inType, float x, float y, float p1, float p2, float p3, float p4, int button_state) PANGOLIN_OVERRIDE
246  {
247  ScreenToImage(view.v, x, y, hover[0], hover[1]);
248 
249  if(inType == InputSpecialScroll) {
250  const float d[2] = {p1,p2};
251  const float is[2] = {rview.x.Size(),rview.y.Size() };
252  const float df[2] = {is[0]*d[0]/(float)view.v.w, is[1]*d[1]/(float)view.v.h};
253  ScrollView(-df[0], df[1]);
254  } else if(inType == InputSpecialZoom) {
255  float scale = 1.0 - p1;
256  ScaleView(scale, scale, hover[0], hover[1]);
257  }
258 
259  // Update hover status (after potential resizing)
260  ScreenToImage( view.v, (int)x, (int)y, hover[0], hover[1]);
261  }
262 
263 protected:
264  void FixSelection(XYRangef& sel)
265  {
266  // Make sure selection matches sign of current viewport
267  if( (sel.x.min<sel.x.max) != (rview.x.min<rview.x.max) ) {
268  std::swap(sel.x.min, sel.x.max);
269  }
270  if( (sel.y.min<sel.y.max) != (rview.y.min<rview.y.max) ) {
271  std::swap(sel.y.min, sel.y.max);
272  }
273  }
274 
275  void AdjustScale()
276  {
277  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
278  if(tv.target.x.AbsSize() > tv.rview_max.x.AbsSize())
279  tv.target.x.Scale(tv.rview_max.x.AbsSize() / tv.target.x.AbsSize(), tv.target.x.Mid());
280  if(tv.target.y.AbsSize() > tv.rview_max.y.AbsSize())
281  tv.target.y.Scale(tv.rview_max.y.AbsSize() / tv.target.y.AbsSize(), tv.target.y.Mid());
282  }
283 
284  void AdjustTranslation()
285  {
286  ImageViewHandler& tv = linked_view_handler ? *linked_view_handler : *this;
287  if( tv.target.x.max > tv.rview_max.x.max) tv.target.x -= tv.target.x.max - tv.rview_max.x.max;
288  if( tv.target.x.min < tv.rview_max.x.min) tv.target.x -= tv.target.x.min - tv.rview_max.x.min;
289  if( tv.target.y.min > tv.rview_max.y.max) tv.target.y -= tv.target.y.min - tv.rview_max.y.max;
290  if( tv.target.y.max < tv.rview_max.y.min) tv.target.y -= tv.target.y.max - tv.rview_max.y.min;
291  }
292 
293  static ImageViewHandler* to_link;
294  static float animate_factor;
295 
296  ImageViewHandler* linked_view_handler;
297 
298  pangolin::XYRangef rview_default;
299  pangolin::XYRangef rview_max;
300  pangolin::XYRangef rview;
301  pangolin::XYRangef target;
302  pangolin::XYRangef selection;
303 
304  float hover[2];
305  int last_mouse_pos[2];
306 
307  bool use_nn;
308 };
309 
310 float ImageViewHandler::animate_factor = 1.0f / 2.0f;
311 ImageViewHandler* ImageViewHandler::to_link = 0;
